response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. Given its significance, I believe it would also be a valuable addition to your collection or business. I am offering this product to you at a special price of $950,000. This amount reflects not only the intrinsic value of the item but also the potential it could hold for you. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing the details further if you are interested.", "product_price": 950000}
